video.title: Meteor Garden
video.synopsis: Dong Shancai is determined to excel at her dream university, where she encounters an elite clique of dashing, popular high-achievers -- and finds love.

episodes.synopsis: Eighteen-year-old Shancai kicks off her first year at Ming De University with misadventures, drawing the ire of popular school heartthrob Daoming Si.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After Shancai turns down his condescending offer, Ah Si deals her friend Qinghe a Joker card. Ah Si and Huaze Lei come to blows over Shancai.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Shancai sees a different side of Ah Si when he visits her at her family home. In Sanya, she overhears Lei and Tengtang Jing discussing their past.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Shancai's nosy classmate shows Ah Si a video recording and causes a heated confrontation, turning Ah Si into Shancai's worst nightmare.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jing makes a shocking announcement about her career at her 24th birthday celebration. Shancai decides to help reconcile Jing and Lei.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: After Shancai loses a card challenge against the F4, she and Ah Si wind up on a date, where an elevator mishap brings them closer.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A photo of Shancai surfaces online, making her the target of public humiliation. Ximen Yan and Feng Meizuo track down the origin of the posting.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Lei returns from France a changed person and confesses to Shancai he's heartbroken about Jing. Shancai realizes she's not over Lei.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ah Si is determined to shut Lei out of the F4. Shancai is deeply moved by Daoming Zhuang's stories about Ah Si as a child.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: A heated game of bridge pits Shancai and Lei against Ah Si and Meizuo, but Ah Si forfeits at the last minute. Shancai's dad makes a bold career move.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Before going to London, Ah Si makes a scene at Shancai's workplace. Tian Ye is about to lose his shot at becoming head chef, but Shancai saves the day.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Shancai learns Tian Ye's real identity. With Ah Si's encouragement, Shancai joins a culinary competition to win a cash prize and help out her family.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Under Zhuang and Ah Si's guidance and encouragement, Shancai refines her cooking skills for the competition -- but she faces a formidable opponent.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: When Shancai panics in the final round, Ah Si gives her motivation to make a Shanghainese dish with a creative touch that impresses the judges.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Business soars at the tea shop, thanks to Lei, Ximen and Meizuo, giving Shancai a chance to holiday in Canada, where she and Ah Si continue to bicker.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Ah Si braves the storm in search of Shancai. Despite their wrongdoing, Shancai comes to Xinhui and Baihe's aid when they face expulsion from the lodge.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Jing calls Lei with unexpected news. Jealous Ah Si sabotages Shancai's reunion with friends and scuffles with her old classmate's brother, Yan Shunping.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Shunping's ulterior motives come to light. Shancai taunts her abusers, praying that Ah Si doesn't come to her rescue and put himself in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Shancai arrives at Ah Si's upper-crust birthday celebration, where an incident pits Ah Si against his mom, who's keen on humiliating Shancai.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Daoming Feng arranges a date for Ah Si and invites Shancai to watch, but her antics backfire, and prospective match He Yuanzi befriends Shancai.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Ah Si reluctantly agrees to meet with Xiao Zi, but his heart still belongs to Shancai. During an incident at the spa, Lei rushes to Shancai's aid.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: A misunderstanding leads Shancai to believe Ah Si and Xiao Zi are an item. Daoming Feng and Shancai engage in another heated confrontation.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Shancai fulfills her cleaning duties as Ms. Yu lays down the law around the house. Ah Si asks Shancai to give their relationship a chance for one month.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Jiang Xiaoyou's boyfriend shows his true colors, and Ah Si storms out of the double date in anger. Ximen offers to help Xiaoyou get back at her ex.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: To ward off Terence, Zhou Caina calls Meizuo for a date. Arriving home unannounced, Daoming Feng spars with Ms. Yu, who firmly defends Shancai.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Meizuo runs into Terence at Caina's house. Lei warns Shancai that Daoming Feng will resort to malicious maneuvers to strike at her closest friends.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Daoming Feng leaves Shancai no choice but to cave into her demands. Caina finds the architect her father seeks -- and it's someone she knows.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: As Shancai's whereabouts remain unknown to her friends, Ah Si shuts himself in. Shancai considers a business proposal from her family's landlord.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: When Ye Mingchuan accepts a globe-trotting job offer, Caina faces a dilemma. Lei stumbles upon a video of Shancai selling squid at her bustling stand.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Meizuo confesses his selfless, unrequited love for Caina and urges her to go after Ye Mingchuan. Ah Si confronts Shancai, who gives back his necklace.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Shancai confesses to Ms. Yu her true feelings toward Ah Si. With his violin, Lei makes a public display of his affections for Shancai.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: After Ah Si announces he won't give up on Shancai after all, Lei tests Ah Si's resolve and asks Shancai to turn off her phone for 48 hours.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Ah Si and Shancai decide to turn over a new leaf. A band of suited men follow Shancai home, and Meizuo suspects they're linked to Daoming Feng.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Yu tells Ah Si how Daoming Feng tore apart Zhuang's love life. Xiaoyou confesses her feelings to Ximen, but he responds with mixed messages.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Despite Ximen's efforts to keep her at arm's length, Xiaoyou refuses to give up. Shancai notices someone has rented out the flat next door to her.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Faced with strict surveillance from Daoming Feng's guards, Ah Si and Shancai come up with various schemes to outwit them, and Zhuang lends a hand.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Ximen opens up to Xiaoyou about the cause of his commitment issues. Zhuang bribes the guards to keep mum about Ah Si's whereabouts.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyou shows Ximen what Xiao Geng once wanted to him to see. Ah Si realizes he and Shancai can't keep things under wraps for much longer.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Daoming Feng cuts off Ah Si's bank account access and sends guards after him. Shancai winds up in London in search of Ah Si.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: The Daoming family's fortune rests on a deal with Xiao Zi's dad, and Ah Si is forced to make a difficult decision about his relationship with Shancai.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: After Xiao Zi urges Ah Si to get in touch with Shancai, the couple spend a bittersweet day together in London before bidding each other farewell.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: As Daoming Feng scrambles to track down the abductors, Shancai and Ah Si find themselves on a deserted island -- and at the center of a friendly ruse.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Ah Si wakes up in the hospital, claiming to have no memory of Shancai. Shancai's mom begins to doubt her daughter's relationship with Ah Si.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyou asks Ximen to give a workshop to the students at her tea society, only to discover that Geng Yifen is Xiao Geng from Ximen's past.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Ah Si pops the question at a wonton shop, but Shancai's mom advises him to obtain Daoming Feng's permission before proceeding any further.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Ximen tries to pull off a special surprise on his first official date with Xiaoyou. Daoming Feng's sleight of hand jeopardizes the engagement.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Xiao Zi asks Shancai to convince Ah Si to give up his hunger strike. Ximen, Meizuo and Lei recall Ah Si's secret business plan for the Daoming Group.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Xiao Zi announces her final decision regarding her marriage to Ah Si. The Daoming Group draws funding from investors, thanks to Ah Si's business plan.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Meizuo, Ximen and Lei present themselves to Shancai as potential grooms, but it turns out to be a ploy -- and Ah Si makes a surprise appearance.
episodes.title: Episode 49
